channel.title: Comments on: Sonic Bomb Alarm Clock
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Yeah, I know. Luckily, I get up easily. But for some reason I like alarm clocks - it fascinates me to see how hard it is for other people to wake up.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I know. Luckily, I get up easily. But for some reason I like alarm clocks – it fascinates me to see how hard it is for other people to wake up.

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: Terrible invention - woken up like this i'll probably go and murder someone :)
item.content:encoded: Terrible invention – woken up like this i’ll probably go and murder someone :)
